sentences.en: A pall of oily black smoke drifted over the cliff-top.
sentences.cn: 一团油腻的黑色烟雾飘到悬崖顶上。

sentences.en: A waterfall cascades down the cliff from the hills behind.
sentences.cn: 一处瀑布从身后山崖上飞流直下。

sentences.en: From his position on the cliff top, he had a good view of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 他在悬崖之巅，海港景色一览无余。

sentences.en: He scrambled 200 feet up the cliff face.
sentences.cn: 他沿着崖面向上攀登了200英尺。

sentences.en: He stood on the edge of the cliff.

sentences.cn: 在这种天气条件下,雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中.

sentences.en: The car fell over a cliff and the driver was drowned.
sentences.cn: 汽车从悬崖上翻下来,司机溺水而亡.

sentences.en: The car rolled over the edge of a cliff.

sentences.cn: 崖边危险,应该用栏杆围起来.

sentences.en: The cliff face has been steadily eroded by the sea.
sentences.cn: 峭壁表面逐渐被海水侵蚀。

sentences.en: The election is likely to be a cliff-hanger.

sentences.cn: 工人们沿着崖壁作了一次地质勘察.

sentences.en: They came straggling up the cliff road.
sentences.cn: 他们零零散散地沿着悬崖小路走上来。

sentences.en: They learned to rappel down a cliff.
sentences.cn: 他们学会了绕绳从绝壁上滑下。

sentences.en: We hiked the Grand Canyon, exploring Indian cliff dwellings.
sentences.cn: 我们去大峡谷徒步旅行，探究印第安人的崖居。
